name: Hunted Hunter
description:
You are a monster, and you are being hunted.

Hunt the hunters, eradicate them before they eradicate you.

[Potential arachnophobia warning]

-------

A simplistic reverse horror stealth game.

There is a tutorial at the start of the game but controls are also listed here:
Controls:
- W A S D  for movement
- Mouse to aim
- Mouse left click to attack
- Hold left shift to sneak

Each kill will grant one additional point of health.

-------

Game made for the UCA 2021 Winter Jam.
All assets were created by me within the given time.
